description.p: Extract the hour from a date or time value.
Returns the hour from a date or time value.

discussion.p: The Hour function extacts the hour from a date or time value.

example.caption: Hour() function executed on the Northwind Access database

page.example: SELECT FIRST 1 Now() AS Now, Hour(Now()) AS Later FROM Orders =10/10/2019 12:45:57 00 pm|12
